about_the_game:
Bonle is a casual puzzle solving game designed to help people learn about skeletal anatomy and solve fun puzzles doing it! You can choose from a Human skeleton, a T. Rex skeleton, or a Cat skeleton, and your goal is to guess the target bone that's been selected at random. When you make a guess, the bone will change color to show how close you are to the right answer.

No Prior Knowledge Needed!

Shown below is an example of the bone index, a library that tells you the simplified name for the bone and what you should type. As the difficulty increases, the bones become less and less simplified!

Progression

Progress through game unlocking new skeletons, getting trophies, battling your friends on the leaderboard, competing with the people at home, or buying new cosmetics with in-game currency.

Bonle is a casual puzzle solving game designed to help people learn about skeletal anatomy and solve fun puzzles doing it! You can choose from a Human skeleton, a T. Rex skeleton, or a Cat skeleton, and your goal is to guess the target bone that's been selected at random. When you make a guess, the bone will change color to show how close you are to the right answer.

No Prior Knowledge Needed!

Shown below is an example of the bone index, a library that tells you the simplified name for the bone and what you should type. As the difficulty increases, the bones become less and less simplified!

Progression

Progress through game unlocking new skeletons, getting trophies, battling your friends on the leaderboard, competing with the people at home, or buying new cosmetics with in-game currency.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Quad core 2.3GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: BONLE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Quad core 2.3GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Bonle is a video game designed to help people learn about skeletal anatomy and solve fun puzzles doing it. To progress, you can set new records or gain more points towards your overall score. Use your records to craft new skeletons to play in the game and trade with your friends!
